answers.answer: Praying for you and baby! Good luck
Aww, :) You and baby are in my prayers!! Congratulations!! Blessings for you and baby!!
Good luck! I wish you and your baby a safe delivery and speedy recovery! :)

question: I go in for pre op for my  c section in an hour, then my operation is at 8 tomorrow morning! Im so nervous and scared. Im 37 weeks today, im so ready to meet my little man but im worried he wont be ready. I have gestational diabetes, hypertension and severe preeclampsia so I know its whats best is to get him out, I just worry so much! Please send good thoughts my way!
title: going in for pre-op in an hour!
